original_text: But know this, that if the master of the house had known in what part of the night the thief was coming, he would have stayed awake and would not have let his house be broken into.
korean_text: 너희도 아는 바니 만일 집 주인이 도둑이 어느 시각에 올 줄을 알았더라면 깨어 있어 그 집을 뚫지 못하게 하였으리라

sentences.original_text: that if the master of the house had known
in what part of the night the thief was coming,
and would not have let his house be broken into.
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 자기 집을 털리게 내버려 두지 않았을 것입니다
